divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were getting ready to put the kids to bed. she was in my sons room helping him put his pajamas on and closing the shudders when she saw the craft floating by. it was fairly close to our house, maybe 500-1000 feet away and less than 500 feet off the ground. when she first saw it, it was glowing red and had a thick antenna like structure on top. she ran excitedly to me in the kitchen and said there was something very weird outside. she momentarily protested when i went to run outside but then followed. i saw the craft after it had already passed our house but it was still large enough and close enough for me to see details, including panels on the side which glowed brightly and made the whole craft glow. for a few moments i stood in awe and shock as is casually floated through the neighborhood, changing colors and pulsing. i then ran back inside and got my digital camara which also take movies. by the time i got back out it had moved farther away, but it was still close enough for anyone seeing it with me to know that it was something out of the ordinary. i caputured about 2 minutes of footage, which does not show too much detail but you can clearly see it changing colors and pulsing. eventually it moved below my field of view and i returned inside. neither my wife or i slept very much that night. it was exhilirating, fascinating and a bit frightening. over the next few days we both experienced a bit of mental blocking, like our minds were trying to deny what we saw. we we try to think of the craft it seems like a fantasy, or we have trouble recalling the image. there is absolutely no doubt about what we saw. we cannot say if it alien, or some kind of government technology. all we know is that we saw a very unique, and apparently advanced craft. my 4 1\2 year old son saw it too and called it the "bad army airplane." he drew a picture of it the next day. however, if you ask him about it now he denies that he saw anything. if the video does not come through please email me. i am happy to provide it again.
